description:
Zaryusu Shasha is a lizardman of the Green Claw tribe and younger brother of http://anidb.net/ch92893 [Shasuryu Shasha], the Chief of the Green Claw tribe. He is the one, who managed to unify all lizardman tribes to fight against http://anidb.net/ch72785 [Ainz], who declared a slaughter upon them.
Zaryusu is a Traveler, a member of the tribe who leaves the social hierarchy and is untethered from its traditions and obligations. It is an uncoveted position that is both shunned and respected at the same time.
Zaryusu is a renaissance man due to his circumstances. He single handledly bring his tribe`s level of technology from purely hunting/gathering to near sustainable agriculture. He`s a powerful warrior and his fame is widespread for defeating and succeeding the previous owner of Frost Pain (a legendary sword made of pure ice.) He`s a experienced adventurer and knows of many monsters and mystic arts from his time as a traveler. He`s keenly aware of politics, economy, and population geography. As the crisis of war with the Tomb of Nazarick is inevitable, he is the first one to act and come up with a solution for continuing the survival of his race.
Source: Wikipedia, Novel
name: Zaryusu Shasha
